name: IQ Test - Brain Training Puzzle Game
name_original: IQ Test - Brain Training Puzzle Game
description:
This app can measures your intelligence quotient (IQ).

Features:
- Simple and addicting gameplay
- Highly accurate test prepared by experts.
- When you finish test, you will receive a certificate of your IQ and th ranking.
- Two Modes: Classic Test and Mensa Test.
- It will take you 15~30 minutes to finish the test.
